review: very easy to install and use
author: Kindle Customer

review: Easy set up and lots programs to choose from. Very good price.
author: Jeff H.

review: the fire TV stick remains warm when we are not using it.
author: Lanny Anderson

review: No way to get a hold of seller.  Sent a website that didn't work.  A little complicated and there's no customer support.
author: Steven Aguilar

review: This device could not hold a Wifi connection (with or without the extender) while every other device in my house connects and streams perfectly fine. Possibly just a defect but the process of getting it replaced started turning into shenanigans... I was transferred to 3 different people before I decided to hang up and return it for my money back.
author: Zimberg

review: Doesn't provide the services I was expecting without having to pay extra.
author: Amazon Customer

review: When it works it's good. Too bad it drops off the network every 10 minutes. It gets pretty hot too. My roku is hooked up to the same TV and has no issues with the wifi.
author: christopher
